definition: happening or arising or located within some limits or especially surface
details:
adjective
- happening or arising or located within some limits or especially surface
= example: happening or arising or located within some limits or especially surface
- located inward
= synonyms: interior
- inside the country
= synonyms: home, interior, national
- occurring within an institution or community
= synonyms: intragroup
- innermost or essential
= synonyms: intimate
